description: This information comes from the MTA’s Performance Dashboard and is used to increase transparency at the MTA. The Key Performance Indicators (KPI) are used to track performance is areas such as On Time Performance.

metadata.attribution: MTA Headquarters, New York City Transit, Long Island Rail Road, Metro-North Railroad, MTA Bus and MTA Bridges and Tunnels
